abstract: A value that indicates whether a filter service converted the file.
overview:
## Discussion

The value of this attribute is an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] object containing an integer. Indicates whether the file was converted by a filter service.

If missing or 0, the file was originally in the format specified by [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString/DocumentAttributeKey/documentType]. If negative, the file was originally in the format specified by document type, but the conversion to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString] may have been lossy. If 1 or more, it was converted to this type by a filter service.

The string constant in macOS 10.3 and earlier is `@"Converted"`.

# converted

**Type Property**

A value that indicates whether a filter service converted the file.

## Declaration

```swift
static let converted: NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey
```

## Discussion

The value of this attribute is an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] object containing an integer. Indicates whether the file was converted by a filter service.

If missing or 0, the file was originally in the format specified by [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString/DocumentAttributeKey/documentType]. If negative, the file was originally in the format specified by document type, but the conversion to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString] may have been lossy. If 1 or more, it was converted to this type by a filter service.

The string constant in macOS 10.3 and earlier is `@"Converted"`.

## Getting document metadata keys

- **author**: The author of the document.
- **category**: The document’s category.
- **characterEncoding**: The string encoding for the document.
- **cocoaVersionDocumentAttribute**: The version of Cocoa that created the file.
- **comment**: The document comments.
- **company**: The company or organization name associated with the document.
- **copyright**: The document’s copyright information.
- **creationTime**: The creation date of the document.
- **editor**: The name of person who last edited the document.
- **keywords**: The document keywords.
- **manager**: The name of the author’s manager.
- **modificationTime**: The modification date of the document.
- **readOnly**: An indication of whether the document is read-only.
- **subject**: The subject of the document.
- **title**: The document title.
